definition: Guo Jingjing (1981-), Chinese female diver and Olympic gold medalist

sentences.english: Zhang Jingjing has been the face of silent tears fall quietly.
sentences.chinese: 张晶晶脸上无声的泪水已悄然滑落。

sentences.english: I'm the father of Jinjing and Sulan.
sentences.chinese: 我是晶晶和苏兰的父亲。

sentences.english: I see a 'sack' which appeared to contain a liquid.
sentences.chinese: 我看见里面有一个亮晶晶的小包包，充满着液体。

sentences.english: You want the tank to be invisible, not highlighted by waterdrops.
sentences.chinese: 你希望水缸是隐形的，而非“晶晶亮，透心凉”。

sentences.english: Johnlung unwittingly sees Jing Jing's love confession and realises she is in love with him.
sentences.chinese: 晋龙无意看到晶晶的告白，知道晶晶喜欢他。

sentences.english: I just in the research, what is the sparkling thing above the your mouth?
sentences.chinese: 我只是在研究，你嘴上亮晶晶的东西是什么？

sentences.english: Guo earlier denied dating Mr Fok.
sentences.chinese: 郭晶晶较早前否认和霍启刚拍拖。

sentences.english: Mimi comfort lesser, grandpa will be fine, jingjing has been blame her.
sentences.chinese: 咪咪安慰小雅，爷爷不会有事，晶晶却一直在责怪她。

sentences.english: Is he rose will try to every day to see jingjing.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰谓会设法则他天天能见晶晶。

sentences.english: Grandpa finally woke up, jingjing immediately began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 外公终于醒了过来，晶晶立马开始装哭起来。

sentences.english: Bai jingjing is the most beautiful girl that I have ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 白晶晶是我所看过最美丽的女孩。

sentences.english: Untie sentence Zhang Jingjing puzzled the minds of reporters.
sentences.chinese: 张晶晶的一句话解开了记者心头的疑惑。

sentences.english: The white dress and shining diamond wedding ring are the childhood fantasies of many a young girl.
sentences.chinese: 白婚纱和亮晶晶的钻石戒指是许多小女孩的童年梦想。

sentences.english: I'm Jingjing, come from the beautiful molonggang , Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 嘿嘿，我是晶晶，熊猫来自那美丽的四川卧龙岗。

sentences.english: Most of the men's backs were bared and glistening with sweat.
sentences.chinese: 大多数男人们光着脊梁，汗珠晶晶发亮。
